bool GrBSPArea::Pick ( GrMeshInst *&  meshInst,
GrMesh::STriCollision &  hit,
const MeshInstVec &  meshes,
const MRay &  ray 
)

pick against the meshes in the BSP area.

if we don't intersect with the bounds, then we don't intersect any tris.

pick against all of the meshes we own.

get the current mesh instance.

get the current mesh.

pick each range.

pick against the current range.

did we get any hits?

get the current hit.

is this the new closest hit?

return true if a mesh was hit.
